person.bio: New places, cultures, and experiences bring Sam joy â€“ opportunities to learn, evolve, & open his mind. Having been exposed to many corners of the world, he is inspired by the beauty of our differences, & humbled by the similarities of our desires. Sam is a community builder & is driven to help grow this global effort to bring positive and impactful change to our planet.
person.excerpt: Let's co-create a better future for humanity and for our planet.

node.title: Why we do what we do?
node.excerpt: If not now, when? If not us, who?

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.
